column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Food: WOW. Shrimp cocktail
column7: malted whiskey ice cream.  Everything was phenomenal.  Ryan told us steaks were big enough to share
column8: and that the kitchen recommended that they cut the steak accordingly.  The steak came perfectly done
column9: and cut just right to make it shareable. The Elote corn was to die for; it's an absolute must-order.  The roasted garlic on the mashed potatoes was awesome: roasted until it was almost as soft as melting butter.
